attributes.action: Legislation for the exhumation and repatriation of Prince Duleep Singh’s remains
attributes.background: Duleep Singh was the son of the last Maharaja of the Punjab. He was brought to England and lived in exile. His unfulfilled dream was to return home.  He died in exile and was interred in England. The UK Government should legislate to enable the exhumation and repatriation of Duleep Singh’s remains.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You can find out how to apply for an exhumation licence here:

https://www.gov.uk/apply-for-an-exhumation-licence
